extendedInfo.description: âââ The ONLY app that has Auto Start featureâââ Most comprehensive reports designed for IRS tax returnsâââ Featured in PC World http://www.pcworld.com/article/2020727/app-spotlight-automatically-track-your-mileage-with-triplog.htmlâââ Featured in Seattle King5 TV news http://www.king5.com/news/business/Cash-saving-apps-for-your-new-smartphone-or-tablet-184943151.htmlâ¢ Track vehicle mileage and locations using GPS.â¢ Auto start when plugged in and drive more than 5 mph.  Auto stop when vehicle stops and unplugged.â¢ Three home screen widgets.  One-click start, stop, or pause GPS tracking.â¢ Commercial truck support (scale, lumpers, per diem allowance, state-by-state mileage for IFTA fuel tax report, and track DEF fuel purchase and gas mileage).â¢ IRS compliant tax return HTML and CSV reports and built-in mileage rates.â¢ Take expense receipt photos and upload to the Cloud.â¢ Turn regular expenses into scheduled reminders with time and mileage intervals.â¢ Calculate fuel economy (MPG, L/100km, or KM/L).â¢ Mark locations as tollbooth and automatically apply tolls to trips that pass through the tollboothâ¢ Back up to SD card or cloud (powered by Amazon S3, not associated to your personal Amazon account).â¢ Backup data can be transferred to iOS devices. Transfer through the cloud gives you seamless experience, which requires only a few clicks.â¢ Import locations from phone Contacts and Google Maps via âShareâ optionâ¢ Support multiple vehicles, multiple tax categories (business, medical, charity, etc.) and multiple business entities.â¢ Support units of measure, date format, and currencies in USA, Canada, UK, Australia, South Africa, India, Albania, Czech Republic, Denmark, Iceland, Indonesia, Israel, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Philippines, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Korea, Sweden, Thailand, Turkey, and other EU countries.â¢ Reply to all customer emails within 24 hours[New] TripLog for iOS has been released. Data can be easily transferred to iOS devices. https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/triplog-gps-mileage-log-tracker/id585918522?ls=1&mt=8â¢ USER GUIDE http://BizLogApp.com/userGuide.htmlExcellent customer support.  If you have any questions, please send us email.  We cannot reach you if you only leave review comments.â¢ PRICING http://BizLogApp.com/pricing.htmlPurchased inside of the app and turns on certain features.â¢ PRIVACY NOTICEWe treat your privacy very seriously.  We will never share or sell your personal information to any 3rd party.  Your information belongs to you and stays with you.

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: I love this app! Makes Keeping track of mileage so easy and its a  bonus that you can add in fuel purchases, tolls, parking fees, repairs, etc. Then get reports at tax time or as needed. So worth paying for it.
reviews.author: Stephanie Bougdanos

reviews.title: It\'s pretty good
reviews.comment: The tracking is very good and easy. The sending reports could be better. (the layout of the files). It makes using them for expense claiming hard.
reviews.author: Chris SecondAccount

reviews.title: Fabulous app!
reviews.comment: Wonderfully tracks everything, so I do not have to worry. I am on the road daily and need to track everything for my business. TripLog saves me the headaches of keeping all my miles in one convenient place!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use it for work all the time
reviews.comment: This app works great as a mileage tracker for my work, and I travel quite frequently. I don\'t understand why some people would still use a paper system. They probably would not if they used this app! One improvement that I would make though is the ability to break a single trip into smaller legs or segments. It would make it easier to create my end of month mileage report. Other than that there are no complaints.
reviews.author: Eric Burlison

reviews.title: Customer support
reviews.comment: Customer support saved me thousands. I completed an update and was having issues so I backed my information up and uninstall the software. When I reinstalled the software, I noticed that my backups were not there. I use this software for my taxes and had not completed sending the documents by email to myself in a very long time. Ted at customer support was able to get a more recent copy off of the cloud. In a matter of hours, he responded and made it to where my next restore, I was back in business again. I
reviews.author: Sachin Dohdiya

reviews.title: Very useful!
reviews.comment: This was created with a lot of thought into it. It has the option to use the GPS to log the mileage. Itn also have the option to start tracking automatically.
reviews.author: Shawn Louis

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: It seems to be a good app, still getting to know it, so far i like it. Does what i need for my business, i do a ton of driving, so it\'s nice to see something like this app, that\'s low key and doesn\'t  take a lot of your time to figure it out.
reviews.author: Jaylene Radestock

reviews.title: Great Service & Great App
reviews.comment: This app makes my life sO much easier!  & the service I received from them when I had issues with my phone was really quick & helpful & he\'s in another time zone! - thanks Ted!
reviews.author: Chinelle Bande

reviews.title: Good program
reviews.comment: Having the trip program pull up when you plug your phone in is helpful, but often the mileage zeros out.
reviews.author: Ginger Garvey

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: The best way I\'ve found to track mileage.  Absolutely worth the upgrades as well to split monthly reports.
reviews.author: Paul Allen

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: Started with the free version then decided to upgrade ... being able to specify certain dates to e-mail for tax purposes is great.  Now that I\'ve figured out the service part ... I can better keep track of my oil changes and tire rotations too.  Awesome!
reviews.author: David Roberts

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother with this app. I found it awfully buggy and irritatingly annoying to use. For example, ending a trip would often override previous trip record. Often it wouldn\'t end a trip right away, running the time up in the background.   They really need to test it more before releasing to the market. Too bad. I had high hopes for this one.
reviews.author: Vlad Alexandrovich

reviews.title: Worth every penny!
reviews.comment: I use this app to submit my mileage log to my employer each month. Because I\'m permitted to use my company vehicle for personal use as well, it can be time consuming/challenging to keep all of the data straight and accurate. However,  this app takes all of the headache out of the process. By far,  one of my best app purchases ever. Ty!!!!!
reviews.author: Michelle Harris

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Records everything u need. Mileage, fuel, expenses, all in a simple report that u email t urself. Highly recommend. I own a small fleet of trucks and all my drivers have this app on their phones which allows them to concentrate on the road.
reviews.author: Robert Lopez

reviews.title: So easy
reviews.comment: Love this, makes it really simple to do my fuel card returns each month. It remembers to record journeys when I forget!  Would love to see a more Holo interface, and simple ways to get monthly or 4-weekly data. And an option to rename \"gasoline\" to \"petrol\" ;-)
reviews.author: Chris Appleton

reviews.title: Shuts down unexpectedly
reviews.comment: Loses data, shows zero after Trip with auto start 30% of time.  This started after paying for upgrade. Have lost several trips and reimbursements because of.  When it works out does great.  Wish I could honestly rate 5 star.
reviews.author: Ronald D. Gregory

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: I\'m a pet sitter and before this app I kept forgetting to record my mileage, now it\'s so easy, and I don\'t even use the automatic gps recorder function which I\'m sure is pretty cool for those who do. The fuel purchase tracking and irs mileage calculations are going to save me a lot of headache for this year\'s taxes. Finally the support is great. I had a rare issue where it froze up, reported it, and I only had to record my stuff by hand for a day (maybe less but that\'s when I tried it again).
reviews.author: Debra Davis

reviews.comment: Great app. Would like a little more options to adding tollboths such as choosing from those identified on a map.
reviews.author: Charles Krueger

reviews.title: Its a great app
reviews.comment: Great but wish it was free when i try to get the report
reviews.author: Wilfredo Santiago

reviews.title: Mileage
reviews.comment: Great support.  To be fair to the developer, after a lot of emails they have resolved the issue that had developed. I have left at 4 stars subject to a longer test
reviews.author: A Google User
